DOC.brief_summary: The study aimed to evaluate the chronic effects of Mat Pilates Training on blood pressure, heart rate, double product and psychobiological factors in hypertensive medicated women and acute effects of Mat Pilates Exercise on blood pressure of such individuals.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Mat Pilates Training on Blood Pressure of Hypertensive Individuals
DOC.criteria: Hypertensives women Age 30 to 59 years Nonactive Make use of antihypertensive medication Orthopedic problems or other problem that prevented the exercises Change in drug treatment during protocol Absence in more than 25% of the exercise sessions
